title.value: Influence of complex usage of mineral fertilizers and plant protection means on the intensity of productive processes, yield and quality of grain winter triticale
Влияние комплексного применения минеральных удобрений и средств защиты растений на интенсивность продукционных процессов, урожайность и качество зерна озимого тритикале

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Tsyganov, A.R., Belarusian National Technical University, Minsk (Belarus)
Vildflush, I.R., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of separate and complex usage of mineral fertilizers and plant protection means on the intensity of productive processes, yield and quality of winter triticale (Triticosecale) grain cultivated on sod-podzolic light loamy soil. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus on the trial field of Belarus Academy of Agriculture (Gorki, (Belarus)) in 2004-2007. As a result of realized research it was revealed that complex application of mineral fertilizers and plant protection products had a positive influence on the dynamics of leaf growth on the surface and the value of leaf photosynthetic potential of winter tritium feces. Based on the actual maximum grain yield (65.0 t/ha) of winter triticale, it was found that the leaf area and leaf photosynthetic capacity during interphase period 'flag leaf – earing' with the values 67.2 thousand of square m/ha and 1.10 mln square m day/ha for winter triticale were optimal. Between winter triticale grain yield and leaf area on the surface, photosynthetic potential was marked strongly expressed dependence (R2 = 0.95-0.97). Effective agrochemical methods of crop treatment were : N15 UAN at the early earing phase on the background N19P70K100 + N50 + N30 UAN + Rex T; Multicomponent fertilizer Vitamar-3 at 1 l/ha with N30 UAN at the beginning of booting stage on the background N19P70K100 + N50 + Rex T; Ehpin 20 mg/m in the tank mixture with N30 UAN at the beginning of booting stage on the background N19P70K100 + N50 + Rex T and Ehpin 20 mg/m in tank mixture with a dose of Rex T 0.6 l/ha at the beginning of booting stage on the background N19P70K100 + N50 + N30 UAN.
